author: jochembrouwer
content: Hey all, at the research call today the point was brought up about the importance of RPC and running local nodes (thanks <@301186049323958275>). I think this also somewhat highlights that we should put much more love into creating and maintaing the RPC spec. Just wanted to note that here. I will also try to put more time in this to get the spec ready at "basis" level and ensure the test suite covers this.
